item.title: Americano
item.description: Ingredients 45 ml Campari 45 ml Sweet vermouth 45 ml Soda water 1/2 orange slice Instructions Build in rocks glass over ice. Garnish with orange slice.

item.title: Mojito
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Rum 20 ml Lime juice 20 ml Sugar syrup a few Mint leaves Soda water mint sprig Instructions Crush ice in clean tea towel. Lightly clap mint. Add ingredients except soda to highball glass. Add crushed ice and stir briefly, and top with soda water. Garnish with a mint sprig.

item.title: Paloma
item.description: Note: There are two recipes, a “simple” one and a “complex” one. Ingredients (simple) 60 ml Tequila 120 ml Grapefruit soda 5 ml Lime juice pinch of salt Instructions (simple) Mix together in a highball glass over ice. Garnish with lime wedge. Ingredients (complex) 45 ml Tequila 30 ml Grapefruit juice 15 ml Lime juice 5 ml Agave syrup splash of Soda water (optional) lime or grapefruit wedge Instructions (complex) Shake ingredients.

item.title: Scotch and soda
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Scotch 90 ml Soda water Instructions Build in rocks glass over ice.

item.title: Spritz Veneziano
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Prosecco 45 ml Aperol 20 ml Soda water orange slice olive Instructions Build in wine glass over ice. Garnish with orange slice and olive.

item.title: Tom Collins
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Gin 30 ml Lemon juice 15 ml Sugar syrup Soda water lemon slice Instructions Add ingredients except soda to highball glass and stir to combine. Add soda water to halfway up glass. Fill glass with ice. Garnish with lemon slice.
